description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 6a. 27 lines per page. Written in small naskh in black ink with use of red. Text within a double-line frame in red and blue ink. Title (fol. 6a) in blue and red ink. Ff. 6a, 6b and 7a with gold leaf frame. Ff. 1a-4b contents grid ruled in red ink. European glazed paper. Few marginal notes. Modern foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Foliation in Arabic numerals in black ink, starts on fol. 7a. Title on the lower edge of the text block (illegible). Autograph copy, completed in Mecca ("fī al-Ḥaram al-Muḥtaram") in the middle of Shaʻbān 1008 -- colophon (fol. 419b). Illegible ownership seal and several ownership statements on fol. 6a. Label on inside of upper cover and on spine: "Aut 79". Incipit: الحمد لله الذي خلق الخلق والاخلاق ... اما بعد فيقول افقرعباد الله الغنى الباري على بن سلطان محمد القاري لما كان موضوع علم الحديث ذات النبي Explicit: سبحانه اعلم تحقيقا وبعونه يوجد العلم لغيره توفيقا والحمد لله اولا واخرا والصلاة و السلام على صاحب المقام المحمود باطنا وظاهرا
author: Qārī al-Harawī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad, -1605 or 1606
abstract: Commentary on Shamāʾil Nabawīyah by Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī (d. 892).
extent: 420 leaves : paper ; 220 x 157 (165 x 96) mm. bound to 240 x 158 mm.
